ShoveBoss

This tool generates shoving ranges for short stack situations in tournaments of Texas Hold'em Poker according to Nash Equilibrium.
Simply click "Calculate Shoving Range" insert the number of players, the ante size, your position and Your Stack in Big Blinds and let ShoveBoss do the math for you.

vs Tight 9 vs Random 1 vs Random 9
